The aim is to produce a model that can predict the value of a measurand of interest, such as the concentration of a particular chemical constituent in complex biological material. In this paper we demonstrate the ability of evolutionary search to provide adaptive averaging of spectral regions to provide selective tradeoff between spectral resolution and signal-to-noise ratio.
